meanings.definition: To come together again after being apart.
meanings.sent1: The friends reunited at the park after school.
meanings.sent2: The family reunited for a special dinner on Sunday.
meanings.sent3: The lost sock reunited with its pair in the laundry basket.
meanings.sent4: The puzzle pieces reunited to reveal a beautiful picture.
meanings.sent5: The sun and moon reunited in the evening sky, creating a stunning sunset.

meanings.definition: To bring together again after being apart.
meanings.sent1: The teacher reunited the students for a group project.
meanings.sent2: The event planner reunited the scattered decorations for the party.
meanings.sent3: The scattered toys were reunited in the toy chest by the child.
meanings.sent4: The chef reunited the flavors in the dish to create a delicious meal.
meanings.sent5: The conductor reunited the musicians for a harmonious symphony performance.
